title: Section on Integrative Medicine (SOIM)
description: Welcome to the Section on Integrative Medicine (SOIM).
cleaned_text: Welcome The Section on Integrative Medicine focuses on education, research, and policy strategies to advocate for the safe use of complementary, nonpharmacologic, and integrative therapies in pediatrics. The Section on Integrative Medicine focuses on education, research, and policy strategies to advocate for the safe use of complementary, nonpharmacologic, and integrative therapies in pediatrics. Get to Know Us Benefits & Criteria Invest in your future, and the future of all children. Gain immediate access to all our latest news, guidance and education - plus, develop connections with peers who share your passion for helping children. Become an engaged member of our Section today.
